methods.name: public void startDream(@NonNull ComponentName name)
methods.comment:
* Starts dream service with name "name". * *

This is only used for testing the dream service APIs. * * @hide

methods.name: public void stopDream()
methods.comment:
* Stops the dream service on the device if one is started. * *

This is only used for testing the dream service APIs. * * @hide

methods.name: public void setActiveDream(@NonNull ComponentName dreamComponent)
methods.comment:
* Sets the active dream on the device to be "dreamComponent". * *

This is only used for testing the dream service APIs. * * @hide

methods.name: public boolean isDreaming()
methods.comment:
* Returns whether the device is Dreaming. * *

This is only used for testing the dream service APIs. * * @hide
